description:
SubStake.getBalance(address) (src/SubStake.sol#53-58) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- userDeposit[_user] == 0 (src/SubStake.sol#54)

SubStake.deposit(uint256) (src/SubStake.sol#38-51) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- userDeposit[msg.sender] == 0 (src/SubStake.sol#40)

Version constraint ^0.8.10 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- VerbatimInvalidDeduplication
	- FullInlinerNonExpressionSplitArgumentEvaluationOrder
	- MissingSideEffectsOnSelectorAccess
	- AbiReencodingHeadOverflowWithStaticArrayCleanup
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- DataLocationChangeInInternalOverride
	- NestedCalldataArrayAbiReencodingSizeValidation.
It is used by:
	- ^0.8.10 (src/SubStake.sol#2)

description: Parameter SubStake.getBalance(address)._user (src/SubStake.sol#53) is not in mixedCase
Parameter SubStake.deposit(uint256)._amount (src/SubStake.sol#38) is not in mixedCase

The following unused import(s) in src/SubStake.sol should be removed:
	-import "forge-std/console.sol"; (src/SubStake.sol#8)
